components.name: Verify
components.description: May be impacted by SMS delivery issues

components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to Mitto Network in Afghanistan

incident_updates.body: We keep observing recovery in SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Mitto Network in Afghanistan. We will continue monitoring the service to ensure a full recovery. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are observing recovery in SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Mitto Network in Afghanistan. We will continue monitoring the service to ensure a full recovery. We will provide another update in 30 min or as soon as more information becomes available.

We keep experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Mitto Network in Afghanistan. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Mitto Network in Afghanistan. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

scheduled_maintenances.name: New Zealand SMS Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our SMS carrier partner in New Zealand is conducting a planned maintenance from 24 February 2024 at 13:00 PST until 24 February 2024 at 13:30 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from a subset of New Zealand handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: US SMS Carrier Maintenance - AT&T

incident_updates.body:
The AT&T network in the US is conducting a series of planned maintenance from 25 February 2024 at 19:00 PST until 01 March 2024 at 04:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from AT&T US handsets.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

25 February 2024 at 19:00 PST until 26 February 2024 at 04:00 PST
26 February 2024 at 19:00 PST until 27 February 2024 at 04:00 PST
27 February 2024 at 19:00 PST until 28 February 2024 at 04:00 PST
28 February 2024 at 19:00 PST until 29 February 2024 at 04:00 PST
29 February 2024 at 19:00 PST until 01 March 2024 at 04:00 PST

incident_updates.body: A subset of small US networks in the US is conducting a planned maintenance from 27 February 2024 at 22:00 PST until 27 February 2024 at 23:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from small US carriers.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance - Three UK

incident_updates.body:
Our carrier partner Three UK is conducting a planned maintenance from 28 February 2024 at 21:30 PST until 28 February 2024 at 23:30 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for Three UK customers.
Impacted Products:
Verify Silent Network Auth, Lookup SIM Swap, Lookup Identity Match, Legacy Identity MatchAndAttributes

scheduled_maintenances.name: Planned Maintenance for Flex Insights Historical Reporting

incident_updates.body: The Flex Insights Historical Reporting dashboards visualisation partner in the US is conducting a planned maintenance on Saturday, March 2nd, 2024, at 1:00 AM Pacific Standard Time. The maintenance window is planned to take up to 2 hours. During the maintenance window Flex Insights Historical Reporting access will be unavailable.

incident_updates.body:

Impacted Products: Lookup Identity Match, Lookup SIM Swap, Legacy Identity MatchAndAttributes.

scheduled_maintenances.name: France and Germany Voice Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our Voice carrier partner in France and Germany is conducting a planned maintenance from 12 March 2024 at 14:00 PST until 12 March 2024 at 20:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent call disconnects and call failures for calls from and to Twilio France and Germany phone numbers.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Philippines SMS Carrier Maintenance - Globe

incident_updates.body: Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

The Globe network in Philippines is conducting an emergency maintenance from 24 February 2024 at 08:00 PST until 24 February 2024 at 09:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Globe Philippines handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Russia SMS Carrier Maintenance - Tele2

incident_updates.body: Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

The Tele2 network in Russia is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 05 February 2024 at 12:00 PST until 28 February 2024 at 16:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Tele2 Russia handsets.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

05 February 2024 at 12:00 PST until 05 February 2024 at 16:00 PST
07 February 2024 at 12:00 PST until 07 February 2024 at 16:00 PST
12 February 2024 at 12:00 PST until 12 February 2024 at 16:00 PST
